summary.span: 支援 控制項，並提供資料繫結控制項的介面，以便對關聯式資料庫執行 SQL 資料作業。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform SQL data operations against relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別主要為了用於資料繫結控制項，而不是網頁程式碼中的可程式化物件。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. ASP.NET 資料來源控制項包含一個或多個資料來源檢視物件所代表的資料清單。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 類別會擴充類別中定義的功能控制項與它相關聯，並實作資料來源控制項的基本資料功能。The class extends the class, defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 類別實作的資料功能控制項，包括， ， ，和作業，排序、 篩選及管理檢視中保留的設定狀態。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 雖然物件不會直接公開到頁面開發人員的許多其屬性會控制。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers by the control, many of its properties are. 資料來源檢視所執行的最基本作業是從基礎資料庫使用的資料擷取方法，它會擷取資料項目的集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying database using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 類別會實作從使用 SQL 查詢的關聯式資料庫擷取資料。The class implements data retrieval from relational databases using SQL queries. 可以參數化 SQL 查詢，以取得更大的彈性和安全性。The SQL queries can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 下列的資料擷取方法、 屬性和事件由實作並直接藉由公開其頁面開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 物件更新資料集中的關聯式資料庫使用 SQL 命令的支援。The object supports updating data in a relational database using SQL commands. 可以參數化 SQL 命令，以取得更大的彈性和安全性。The SQL commands can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 資料繫結控制項，例如並，可以設定為執行使用自動更新，而其他控制項不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform updates automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 下列的 update 方法、 屬性和事件由實作並直接藉由公開其頁面開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 支援關聯式資料庫中插入新的資料列。The supports inserting new rows of data into a relational database. SQL 命令中指定屬性可針對更大的彈性和安全性參數化。The SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 資料繫結控制項，例如並，可以設定為執行使用自動插入，而其他控制項不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform inserts automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 下列插入方法、 屬性和事件由實作並直接藉由公開其頁面開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 物件也支援從關聯式資料庫中刪除資料。The object also supports deleting data from a relational database. 如同其他命令，將 SQL 命令中所指定之屬性可針對更大的彈性和安全性參數化。As with other commands, the SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 資料繫結控制項，例如並，可以設定為執行使用自動刪除，而其他控制項不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform deletes automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 下列刪除方法、 屬性和事件由實作並直接藉由公開其頁面開發人員和其他呼叫端的控制項：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 屬性The property - 屬性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 動態用來篩選資料的資料擷取期間的子句時，資料擷取是功能更強大。Data retrieval is more powerful when the clause that is used to filter the data during data retrieval is dynamic. 換句話說，SQL 查詢使用靜態其中子句不是為有彈性且功能強大的 SQL 查詢的形式，WHERE 子句中的值會繫結至值，可以變更，例如 Web Form 網頁上的控制項中顯示的值。In other words, an SQL query with a static WHERE clause is not as flexible and powerful as an SQL query where the values in the WHERE clause are bound to values that can change, such as values that are displayed in controls on a Web Forms page. 而不會重建 SQL 查詢，並設定每次載入頁面的屬性，您可以使用和套用擷取資料的動態篩選的屬性。Instead of rebuilding an SQL query and setting the property on every page load, you can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 這些屬性由實作並直接藉由公開其控制項資料繫結控制項和其他呼叫端。These properties are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以排序的資料，您使用擷取加入 ORDER BY 子句，這會導致資料庫以執行順序，當您擷取資料，或是在記憶體中排序資料，擷取後的控制項。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an ORDER BY clause, which causes the database to perform the ordering for you when you retrieve data or by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 您可以提供的排序運算式splittunneling屬性物件傳遞至方法。You can supply a sorting expression to the by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 語法屬性是相同的語法屬性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 如果您使用預存程序來擷取資料時，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的參數，專門用於排序的預存程序呼叫的結果。If you use a stored procedure to retrieve data, you can also use the property to specify a parameter that is used specifically for sorting the results of a stored procedure call. 當一個以上的使用者可以同時變更資料庫時，就會並行衝突的可能性。When more than one user can change the database concurrently, there is the potential for concurrency conflict. 控制項的控制項並行透過屬性。The control has controls concurrency through the property. 功能實作在屬性。The functionality is implemented in the property. 像其他許多的 Web 伺服器控制項，實作介面並使用檢視來追蹤其狀態跨網頁要求的狀態。Like many other Web server controls, the implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 實作以及屬性和， ，和方法，以啟用控制項檢視狀態追蹤。Implementations of the and property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在作業期間，當基礎資料庫的資料列資料發生變更時， 控制項如何執行更新和刪除作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the value indicating how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否要將舊的和新值的參數套用至`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 比方說，如果命令是所指定屬性會傳回物件的資料行`Name`並`Number`，和屬性設定為值，參數會針對`Name`和`Number`更新作業。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the update operation. 如果屬性設定為的值，參數會針對`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (原始值的確切名稱的參數取決於。)然後，物件會判斷是否此方法，就指定屬性具有相符的參數。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) Then, the object determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 並行存取控制是資料存放區使用來控制如何讀取及多個用戶端存取和管理相同的資料時，存放區中變更資料的技術。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一個用戶端讀取資料，並提供給使用者，而另一個用戶端讀取相同的資料，並提供給不同的使用者。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果兩個使用者更新的資料，並將它提交至資料存放區，可能會發生一些未預期的結果，因為兩個用戶端可能會更新為相同的資料不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 這會視為衝突。This is considered a conflict. 藉由設定屬性設值，更新作業再比較以原始的資料來源，以便偵測衝突，並視需要處理它們的最大值舊和新值。By setting the property to the value, the update operation can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as required. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 會用來刪除基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來刪除資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以是 SQL 字串或名稱的預存程序中，如果基礎資料庫支援預存程序。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the underlying database supports stored procedures. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字從 Northwind 資料庫的 Orders 資料表中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈現**刪除**自動按鈕時屬性設定為`true`自動填入集合並呼叫方法時**刪除**按一下按鈕時。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true` and automatically populates the collection and calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked. 最後，因為此範例會刪除資料，加入事件處理常式會嘗試將資料庫備份到磁碟刪除作業之前執行。Finally, because this example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 參數名稱可能會受到屬性，明確地說，如果名稱會識別主索引鍵，例如索引鍵所指定使用`DataKeyNames`屬性的資料繫結控制項，或刪除和更新案例屬性設定為值和一組`oldValues`傳遞至對應的資料方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios in which the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱，在`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的參數出現在參數化 SQL 查詢的順序根據集合中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，使集合中的參數符合 SQL 查詢中預留位置的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定文字從 Northwind 資料庫中刪除訂單。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 一開始，資料會從 Orders 資料表中擷取並顯示在控制項。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 您必須明確宣告屬性並呼叫方法時使用資料繫結控制項，例如(不像控制項，例如和，這會自動填入參數和呼叫上資料來源控制項的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike controls, such as the and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此範例中，事件會委派給私用事件處理常式，它會明確呼叫方法控制項。In this example, the event is delegated to the private event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在刪除作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before a delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行刪除作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法取消直接藉由呼叫的作業方法所公開的物件物件。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，在作業取消藉由設定的屬性至`true`。You can, however, cancel the operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理進行刪除作業之前引發的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a delete operation occurs. 因為此範例會從 Northwind 資料庫中，刪除資料處理常式加入嘗試將資料庫備份至磁碟之前執行刪除作業。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承可從資料庫刪除資料的方法。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from a database. 網頁程式開發人員和資料繫結的控制項作者，請不要呼叫方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 中所包含的值`keys`集合會評估並與所包含的任何值合併集合。The values that are contained in the `keys` collection are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果屬性設定為值，包含在值`oldValues`集合會被格式化屬性且也合併。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 執行刪除作業之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行之前刪除任何前置處理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete. 若要執行刪除作業，物件的組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫的物件。To perform a delete operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 刪除作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the delete operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法，以將資料插入資料庫。The class implements the inherited method to insert data into a database. 網頁程式開發人員和資料繫結的控制項作者，請不要呼叫方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 在執行插入作業之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the insert operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行之前插入任何前置處理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an insert. 若要執行插入作業，物件的組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫的物件。To perform an insert operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 插入作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the insert completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法，以從資料庫擷取資料。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data from a database. 網頁程式開發人員和資料繫結的控制項作者，請不要呼叫方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 執行資料擷取之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查參數的值，並執行任何前置處理，才能擷取資料。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before data is retrieved. 若要執行的作業，物件組建物件使用文字以及任何相關聯，並對基礎資料庫中執行它。To perform the operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated , and executes it against the underlying database. 在作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回的值、 錯誤代碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 方法會傳回物件，如果設定為，或物件如果設為。The method returns a object if the is set to , or a object if the is set to . 關閉物件，當您完成讀取資料。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 如果設定為並已啟用快取，則從中擷取資料，並在資料作業期間會將資料儲存至快取。If the is set to and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data operation. 快取建立時，已捨棄，或重新整理基礎的組合所指定的快取行為和屬性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用 Windows 驗證下的用戶端模擬時，第一位使用者存取資料時，會快取資料。When you are using client impersonation under Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一位使用者要求相同的資料，就會從快取擷取資料。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 藉由另一個呼叫資料庫來驗證使用者的存取資料，不會擷取資料。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果您預期有多個使用者存取資料，而且您想要每個擷取資料的資料庫的安全性組態所要驗證，請勿使用快取。If you expect multiple users to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the database's security configurations, do not use caching. 如果設定為並已指定，則會評估以及提供任何和產生的篩選資料擷取作業期間，會套用到的資料清單。If the is set to and a has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the data retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作繼承方法來更新資料庫中的資料。The class implements the inherited method to update data in a database. 網頁程式開發人員和資料繫結的控制項作者，請不要呼叫方法直接; 相反地，使用公開方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 中包含的值`keys`並`values`集合會進行評估，而且與所包含的任何值合併集合。The values contained in the `keys` and `values` collections are evaluated and merged with any values contained by the collection. 如果屬性設定為中, 包含的值`oldValues`集合會被格式化，也會合併。If the property is set to , the values contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the and also merged. 執行更新作業之前，請會呼叫方法以引發事件。Before the update operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件，以檢查參數的值，並執行更新前任何前置處理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before an update. 若要執行的作業，建置物件使用文字和任何相關聯屬性，然後執行對基礎資料庫的物件。To perform the operation, the builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在作業完成之後，會呼叫方法以引發事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以處理這個事件來檢查任何傳回值和錯誤碼，並執行任何後續處理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.

summary.span: 取得或設定當呼叫 時會套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method is called.

value.span: 字串，代表當使用 方法抓取資料時套用的篩選運算式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於語法屬性是一個格式字串樣式語法。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style syntax. 您可以包含在參數屬性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果參數的型別是字串或字元，請使用單引號括住的參數。If the type of the parameter is string or character, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果參數是數值類型，就不需要引號。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含的參數預留位置中找到的評估屬性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控制項支援篩選的資料中的時，才`DataSet`模式。The control supports filtering data only when in `DataSet` mode. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只是篩選條件運算式會取代參數值，以及它套用至所傳回的物件方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果您使用基於安全性考量，以限制傳回，您必須先驗證參數值，篩選發生之前的項目數的屬性。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用篩選和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的屬性控制套用任何時間方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，屬性包含篩選參數，包含此功能的預留位置集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 在此範例中，則 filter 參數是繫結至物件屬性控制項。In this example, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項都有其屬性設定為`true`中的任何變更選取項目會導致頁面回傳至伺服器和重新使用新的篩選器的繫結至資料來源控制項的控制項。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行驗證作業篩選參數值之前物件執行的篩選作業。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the object performs a filter operation. 您可以取消方法，藉由設定屬性物件`true`。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the object to `true`. 只有當引發事件屬性設定。The event is raised only if the property is set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只是篩選條件運算式會取代參數值，以及它套用至所傳回的物件方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果您使用基於安全性考量，以限制傳回，您必須先驗證參數值，篩選發生之前的項目數的屬性。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的參數集合相關聯的任何參數，指定在屬性。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 中指定的參數預留位置會依順序評估及比對中的參數物件集合時呼叫方法。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the are evaluated by order and matched to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該驗證您從用戶端接收任何篩選參數值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 執行階段只是篩選條件運算式會取代參數值，以及它套用至所傳回的物件方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果您使用基於安全性考量，以限制傳回，您必須先驗證參數值，篩選發生之前的項目數的屬性。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，並使用篩選和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的屬性控制套用任何時間方法會執行，以擷取資料。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此範例中，屬性包含篩選參數，包含此功能的預留位置集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，filter 參數是繫結至物件屬性控制項。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因為控制項都有其屬性設定為`true`中的任何變更選取項目會導致頁面回傳至伺服器的資訊和重新繫結至資料來源控制項使用的控制項新的篩選器。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 物件會用來將資料插入基礎資料庫。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to insert data into the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來插入資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to insert data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料，它顯示在控制項，並使用以查看所選的資料列中的詳細資料的控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值中的新增記錄控制項，然後按一下**插入** 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，為指定的值會插入至資料庫和會重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 SQL Server 擷取資料，它顯示在控制項，並使用以查看所選的資料列中的詳細資料的控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項和選取的資料列的也會顯示在控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，請確認選取的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，可用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，藉由在插入資料後控制項至資料庫中，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when an insert operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理插入作業完成後，事件，以檢查的值輸出參數。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an insert operation has completed. 輸出參數都是從與事件相關聯的物件。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a control. 此範例也會使用控制項來顯示所選取的資料列中的詳細資料，以及表單，以插入新的記錄。The example also uses a control to display details of the selected row in the , and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項和選取的資料列的也會顯示在。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the . 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，請確認選取的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface that is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，藉由在插入資料後控制項至資料庫中，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Inserting As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 在插入作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行插入作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法取消資料庫作業，直接藉由呼叫方法物件所公開物件。Therefore, you cannot cancel the database operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，將在資料庫作業取消藉由設定的屬性至`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料，它顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control. 此範例也會使用控制項來顯示所選取的資料列中的詳細資料，以及表單，以插入新的記錄。The example also uses a control to display details of the selected row in the , and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項和選取的資料列的也會顯示在控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，請確認選取的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，可用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object, and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，藉由在插入資料後控制項至資料庫中，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InsertParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 取得包含 屬性所用參數的參數集合。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection containing the parameters that are used by the property.

value.span: ，包含 屬性所使用的參數。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的集合，根據參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中的出現的順序中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將資料插入資料庫，使用控制項和簡單的 Web Form 網頁。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple Web Forms page. 資料表中目前的資料會顯示在控制項。The current data in the table is displayed in the control. 您可以藉由輸入值中的新增記錄控制項，然後按一下**插入** 按鈕。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 當**插入**按一下按鈕時，為指定的值會插入至資料庫和會重新整理。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要是由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法會還原檢視狀態資訊中所儲存的先前頁面要求物件方法。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字串套用至主索引鍵，例如，藉以`DataKeyNames`屬性的資料繫結控制項，或在刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值和一組`oldValues`傳遞至對應的資料方法。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱，在`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 擷取資料，它顯示在控制項，並使用以查看所選的資料列中的詳細資料的控制項和表單，以插入新的記錄。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 一開始，資料會顯示在控制項和選取的資料列的也會顯示在控制項。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 和控制項使用不同的資料來源控制項; 相關聯的一個具有並屬性，請確認選取的資料列的是顯示此項目。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您按一下 自動產生**插入**按鈕控制項，顯示不同的使用者介面，可用來插入新的記錄。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 範例會使用預存程序來插入記錄，並傳回插入的資料列的主索引鍵。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 如果您在插入一筆記錄，會自動填入的呼叫與繫結資料行值的集合方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推斷正確的參數，從任何物件和參數物件時使用 ASP.NET 的雙向資料繫結語法。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此範例中，加入額外的參數在事件處理常式來處理預存程序所傳回的主索引鍵。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最後，藉由在插入資料後控制項至資料庫中，事件處理常式會呼叫來處理會顯示事件，插入的資料列的主索引鍵的值，而方法控制項明確地呼叫，以重新整理資料。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得字串，用於將參數替代符號做為參數型 SQL 查詢中的前置詞。

span.span: Gets the string that is used to prefix a parameter placeholder in a parameterized SQL query.
The "@" string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL 查詢和命令可以參數化，，因為它們包含在執行階段繫結至查詢的值的預留位置。SQL queries and commands can be parameterized, in that they contain placeholders for values that are bound to the query at run time. 根據設定的 ADO.NET 提供者控制項，以識別屬性，參數會評估別名或由其順序在物件。Depending on the ADO.NET provider that is set for the control, which is identified by the property, the parameters are evaluated by alias or by their ordering in the object. 如果未設定或設為，參數會評估的別名和屬性用來加入的參數前置詞屬性的每個物件期間的資料擷取或資料操作作業。If the is not set or is set to the , parameters are evaluated by alias and the property is used to add a parameter prefix to the property of each object in a during a data retrieval or data manipulation operation. 如果屬性設定為或，參數順序會評估並和屬性會被忽略。If the property is set to the or , the parameters are evaluated by order and the and properties are ignored. 如果您擴充類別，您可以覆寫屬性，來提供前置詞以外`"@"`字串，如有必要。If you extend the class, you can override the property to supply a prefix other than the `"@"` string, if required.

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來， 控制項檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的物件；如果沒有任何檢視狀態與物件關聯，則為 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, , if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項，也就是執行個體的屬性的類別。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 的儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期階段之後，字串物件然後保存伺服器控制項的值。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 字串物件的儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期階段之後持續性儲存檢視狀態時，會儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`Hidden`項目。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save state stage of the server control life cycle is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率方法，並修改`ViewState`伺服器控制項的屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 物件會用來擷取基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要使用的 SQL 陳述式與預存程序更安全的做法是屬性。It is more secure to use a stored procedure than a SQL statement for the property. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定基本的 SQL 查詢，以從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在文字控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何設定從 SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在預存程序名稱的文字。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a . 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定基本的 SQL 查詢，以從 SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 並控制項，提供簡單的介面，來更新中所選使用者的地址。The and controls are provided as a simple interface to update the address for the selected user in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定從 SQL Server 資料庫擷取資料，並顯示在預存程序名稱的文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 屬性可以是 SQL 查詢或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的集合，根據參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中的出現的順序中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 資料庫中擷取資料，藉由設定SQL 查詢的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. 在參數化 SQL 查詢和在預留位置屬性會對應到物件加入至集合。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 如此一來，控制項，其中未繫結，做為篩選條件的項目會顯示在控制項。In this way, the control, to which the is bound, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 因為參數用在 WHERE 子句中，使用屬性，此程式碼範例是功能上相當於同時使用和屬性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in this code example is functionally equivalent to using both the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 SQL 字串， 物件會用來更新基礎資料庫的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: SQL 字串， 會用來更新資料。

span.span: A SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者 (可由 屬性識別) 而定。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字串是參數型查詢或命令，參數的替代符號亦須視目前所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者而定。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供者，這是預設提供者類別，該參數的替代符號是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 不過，如果提供者設定為或是，參數的預留位置`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序中，名稱，如果資料來源支援預存程序。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何設定的屬性Microsoft SQL Server database 中的控制和更新資料控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何更新中的資料 ODBC 資料庫控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的屬性控制和更新的資料，在 SQL Server 資料庫中使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 控制項就會自動填入集合中，推斷的參數物件，並呼叫方法時**Update**上編輯連結已選取控制項。The control automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable control is selected. 此範例也包含一些後置處理-更新一筆記錄之後，會傳送電子郵件訊息通知。This example also includes some post-processing - after a record is updated, an email message notification is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例中，也就是功能上與先前的程式碼範例，示範如何更新中的資料 ODBC 資料庫控制項。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 屬性設定為 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供者，和屬性設定為 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 的名稱。The property is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢集合包含任何對應至 SQL 字串中參數預留位置的物件。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders that are in the SQL string. 參數名稱可能會受到屬性，明確地說，如果名稱會識別主索引鍵，例如索引鍵所指定使用`DataKeyNames`屬性，或在刪除和更新案例其中屬性設定為值，以及一組`oldValues`會傳遞至對應的資料方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱，在`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 根據 ADO.NET 提供者，這是參數的順序集合可能很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供者建立關聯的集合，根據參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中的出現的順序中的參數。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供者，也就是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的控制項，將集合中的參數，藉由比對的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名的參數名稱。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 如需有關參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用的參數，使用 SqlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示中的資料控制和更新資料時**送出**按一下按鈕時。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 屬性設定與參數化的 SQL 陳述式，以及兩個參數新增至集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 當**提交**按一下按鈕時，處理事件，以呼叫方法明確。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 在更新作業之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理事件來執行特定應用程式時，用來驗證參數的值，或變更參數值之前的額外的初始化作業控制項執行更新作業。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時不會呼叫事件處理常式委派。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，您無法取消此作業，直接藉由呼叫方法物件所公開物件。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 您可以不過，將在資料庫作業取消藉由設定的屬性至`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示從 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中擷取的資料控制項，並更新記錄使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 此範例示範如何使用物件時使用，將交易內容控制項更新資料。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
